Develop a mobile app that helps users find and book local experiences such as tours, cooking classes, and adventure activities. The app could use AI to personalize recommendations based on the user's interests and location.

Create a mobile app that uses augmented reality to up old furniture and decor. Users could scan an item, see how it would look with a new finish or color, and purchase the necessary materials through the app.

Develop a mobile app that connects users with local farmers and producers to purchase fresh, locally-sourced produce and products. The app could also include recipes and cooking tips to help users make the most of their purchases.

Create a mobile app that helps users plan and organize their travel itineraries. The app could include features such as flight and hotel bookings, restaurant reservations, and local attraction recommendations.

Develop a mobile app that helps users learn a new language. The app could use AI to personalize lessons based on the user's learning style and level, and include interactive features such as chatbots and virtual assistants to the user's practice.
